location.physicalLocation: British Library: India Office Records and Private Papers

titleInfo.title: Letter from William Bruce, Resident, Bushire, to Francis Warden, Chief Secretary to the Government, Bombay

mods.abstract: In this letter, William Bruce, Resident at Bushire, acknowledges the receipt of Government commands dated 1 January 1820, which directed him to dispatch a packet to the Envoy at Tehran by express messengers. Bruce confirms that the dispatches were forwarded this morning as directed.
